summary.para: Creates a read-only bundle object to which encrypted Windows app packages can be added.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A stream for reading the encrypted bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: bundleReader
param.para: The bundle reader object created.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates a write-only bundle object to which encrypted Windows app packages can be added.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: bundleVersion
param.para: The version number of the bundle. If the bundle version is 0, a default version based on the current system time will be generated.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: The list of files to be exempted from encryption.

param.name: bundleWriter
param.para: The bundle writer object created.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates a new instance of IAppxEncryptedPackageReader.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the package. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: packageReader
param.para: The package reader object created.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates a new instance of an .

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for sending bytes produced by the app package.

param.name: manifestStream
param.para: A readable stream that defines the package for the AppxManifest.xml.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the package. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: The list of files to be exempted from encryption.

param.name: packageWriter
param.para: The package writer object created.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates an unencrypted Windows app bundle from an encrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app bundle to be decrypted.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A validation stream for writing the resulting decrypted app bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the bundle. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates an unencrypted Windows app package from an encrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app package to be decrypted.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting decrypted app package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for decrypting the package. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates an encrypted Windows app bundle from an unencrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app bundle to encrypt.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app bundle.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the bundle.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key info containing the base encryption key and key ID for encrypting the bundle. The base encryption key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If this parameter is null, the global test key and key ID are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: The list of files to be exempted from encryption.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates an encrypted Windows app package from an unencrypted one.

param.name: inputStream
param.para: A readable stream from the app package to be encrypted.

param.name: outputStream
param.para: A writable stream for writing the resulting encrypted app package.

param.name: settings
param.para: Settings for creating the package.

param.name: keyInfo
param.para: Key information containing the base encryption key and key ID. The base key is used to derive the per file encryption keys. If the base key is null, the global test key and key Id are used.

param.name: exemptedFiles
param.para: The list of files to be exempted from encryption.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

summary.para: Creates objects for encrypting, decrypting, reading, and writing packages and bundles.
